text: It even happens to Beyonce. The challenge with high - tech concert production is, like all machinery, sometimes it malfunctions. And Saturday night, at the Warsaw stop of Jay - Z and Beyonce ’ s “ On the Run II ” tour, a flying stage that ordinarily enables the singer to hover over the grown got stuck 20 feet in the air, forcing a rather undignified exit. Stage techs were forced to go old - school to bring Beyonce back down to earth via an ordinary ladder. The band vamped while Beyonce initially appeared reluctant to descend via the ladder — understandable considering her towering heels — but eventually capitulated.
